.pull-left[
### Access
Right radial, 6F  
RCA: JR-4, 5F  
LCA: JL-3.5, 5F  
Grafts: IM, JR-4, MPA, and LCB (5F)  
Guide: XB 3.5, 6F  

### Interventions
IVUS to size lesion  
Balloon of distal to proximal LCX to LM  
DES x2 (2.75 x 38 mm, 3.5 x 12 mm) placed sequentially  
Post-dilation with 3 x 20 mm and 4 x 8 mm   
Post IVUS to confirm sizing  
]

.pull-right[
### Outcomes
- CTO of pRCA and pLAD
- CTO of SVG-OM
- Ectatic disease of SVG-dRCA
- Culprit lesion of LM/LCX to OM1
- Placement of DES x2 
]

---

.pull-left[
### Access
Left radial, 6F
RCA: JR-4, 5F  
LCA: JL-3.5, 5F  
Grafts: IMA, JR-4 for SVGs  
Right radial, 6F   
Guide: XB 3.5 -> AL 0.75 -> JR4 -> AL1  

### Intervention (staged)
Guide "escalation" for successful engagement  
Buddy wire (Sion Blue and BMW) for support  
Sequential balloon d/t difficulty delivering equipment  
Primary stent placement in ostial lesion  
Reshaping with NC balloons  
]

.pull-right[
### Outcomes
- 4V CABG with LIMA-LAD, SVG-D1, SVG-OM/RPDA (single conduit jump graft)  
- Significant obstruction of ostial SVG-OM/RPDA   
- Placement of DES x 1

**SVG engagement is challenging.**
]
